post:
Host Mayo is affordable web hosting provider since 2015. Host Mayo offers Cpanel & Directadmin Web Hosting in USA and Netherland respectively. Over the span of last few years HM has expanded their product range to cover all hosting products including simple web hosting to enterprise level VPS and dedicated servers.
Features of web hosting are as follow:
  • NodeJS
  • Free SSL
  • LiteSpeed
  • SSH Access
  • CloudLinux
  • Remote MySQL
  • Ruby on Rails
  • Free Migration
  • MariaDB (MySQL)
  • Pure SSD storage
  • Private Name Servers
  • 24/7 Technical Support
  • Mulitple PHP Selections
  • Softaculous Auto Installer
  • One Click WordPress Installer
